downloadDescription: This document briefly describes the features and enhancements in Microsoft Dynamics GP 2013.
detailsSection: This document lists enhancements to accounting and business process functionality.
systemRequirementsSection: To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the document in PDF file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
  3. Repeat these steps on each computer where you want to install the document, or save the file to a shared folder where other others can access it.
